query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST111 AS A SET A.ARA = #CAB# ,A.BSU = #CHB# ,A.JUJ = #JUB# ,A.BUJ = #BUB# ,A.GBU = #GHB# ,A.RDD = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,A.RDT = HEX(CURRENT TIME) ,A.RSB = '999999' ,A.BPM = ( SELECT B.BSU_PM FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS B WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.LGORT = #CHB# ) WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = #PJT# AND A.HNO = #HNO#
